item.description:
Let's go play in all the new snow we are supposed to get! This will be a snowshoe hike of about 3 miles on level ground along the Braintree Pass Path and Bouncing Brook Pass. Link to trail map http://www.mass.gov/d...

I will be parking at the Parking Area at the corner of Rt 28 and Chickatawbut Rd.
*In the event that the parking area is closed or full, I will be parking at the Parking Area south of Chickatawbut Rd on Rt. 28 (approx. 0.3mi) and walking down to this lot.
item.name: Blue Hills snowshoe hike
